generic_en.name: Generic English
generic_en.body:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my interest in the [Position] position at [Company]. With my background in instrumentation engineering and control systems, I believe I would be a valuable addition to your team.

My experience includes:
- Designing and implementing control systems for industrial processes
- Troubleshooting and maintaining instrumentation equipment
- Collaborating with cross-functional teams to optimize system performance

I have attached my CV for your review. I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my skills and experience align with your needs.

Thank you for your consideration.

Best regards

Je vous remercie de l'attention que vous porterez à ma candidature.

Cordialement

generic_english.name: Generic English
generic_english.body: Dear Hiring Manager, I am excited to apply for the [Postion] role at [Company]. My hands-on experience with PLCs, SCADA/HMI systems, and field instrumentation aligns strongly with your operations. During my internship at Sonatrach GL1K, I redesigned the air dryer control system using Siemens TIA Portal and WinCC, resolving pressure instability and synchronization faults. The redesign led to a 20% improvement in air quality and reduced system downtime by 15%, formalized as my engineering thesis. I’m also experienced with HART-based calibration, loop checks, and interpreting ISA-compliant diagrams. My trilingual fluency (Arabic, English, French) enables me to work effectively across technical and team environments. I’m available immediately and eager to contribute to the company's standards of technical excellence and safe field performance. Sincerely, Aimen Berkane
